IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: PSYCHOSOCIAL SUPPORT TO CANCER PATIENTS & THEIR FAMILIES & THEIR CAREGIVERS.
IRS990.MissionDesc: OUR MISSION IS TO HELP PEOPLE AFFECTED BY CANCER ENHANCE THEIR HEALTH AND WELL-BEING THROUGH PARTICIPATION IN A PROFESSIONAL PROGRAM OF EMOTIONAL SUPPORT, EDUCATION AND HOPE. ALL SERVICES ARE OFFERED AT NO COST TO PEOPLE WITH CANCER AND THEIR LOVED ONES.
IRS990.Desc: ALL-INCLUSIVE PROGRAMMING INCLUDES SUPPORT GROUPS, STRESS REDUCTION, EDUCATIONAL PROGRAMS AND SOCIAL CONNECTIONS/ACTIVITIES DESIGNED TO HELP ANYONE IMPACTED BY CANCER. ALL PROGRAMS AND SERVICES PROVIDED AND HOSTED BY THE CANCER SUPPORT COMMUNITY OF GREATER CINCINNATI AND NORTHERN KENTUCKY ARE FREE OF CHARGE. OUR GENEROUS DONORS MAKE IT POSSIBLE TO STRENGTHEN ALL IMPACTED BY CANCER THROUGH AN INCLUSIVE COMMUNITY OF CARE. IN 2019, CSC SERVED MORE THAN 4,000 INDIVIDUALS, RESULTING IN 23,200 INDIVIDUAL VISITS. IN 2019 THERE WERE 166 NEW ORIENTEES THAT ATTENDED THE CONNECT TO THE COMMUNITY. CSC HAD 3,760 VISITS TO SUPPORT AND NETWORKING GROUPS, 1685 VISITS TO OUR EDUCATIONAL PROGRAMS LED BY COMMUNITY EXPERTS, 7,725 VISITS TO OUR HEALTHY LIFESTYLE ACTIVITIES (TAI CHI, MEDITATION, YOGA, ZUMBA, REIKI AND MORE) AND 2046 VISITS TO OUR SOCIAL EVENTS. CSC ALSO HAD 3,484 INDIVIDUALS SUPPORT SESSIONS FOR CRISIS MANAGEMENT, RESOURCE GUIDANCE AND EMOTIONAL SUPPORT. CANCER SUPPORT COMMUNITY IS COMMITTED TO ENHANCING OFFERINGS TO THE COMMUNITY SPECIFICALLY TO UNDERSERVED POPULATIONS, FAMILIES AND DIFFICULT TO REACH AREAS OF THE REGION. CSC HAD 988 VISITS TO FAMILY PROGRAMS. CANCERSUPPORTSOURCE (CSS) IS A BRIEF VALIDATED RESEARCH BASED SURVEY TO UNDERSTAND PATIENTS AND CAREGIVERS UNIQUE NEEDS AND WANTS AND TRIAGE TO MOST APPROPRIATE SUPPORT AND PROGRAMS. THE INDIVIDUAL RECEIVES A CUSTOMIZED MY SUPPORT CARE PLAN. CANCERSUPPORTSOURCE SURVEY IDENTIES CONCERNS THAT NEED TO BE ADDRESSED EARLY ON IN DIAGNOSIS BEFORE THEY BECOME A BARRIER TO CARE.2019 TOTAL PATIENT / SURVIVOR SURVEYS= 331 CSS 2019 CAREGIVER SURVEY: 54OUTCOME DATA: DECREASE IN DEPRESSION BY 41% DISTRESS DECREASED BY 30% 97% OF RESPONDENTS FOUND CSS HELPFUL

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: TO HELP INSURE THE LONG TERM FINANCIAL VIABILITY OF THE ORGANIZATION AND ITS ABILITY TO ACHIEVE ITS MISSION AND TO DELIVER ITS PROGRAMS INTO THE FUTURE.
CHANGE IN VALUE OF CHARITABLE REMAINDER TRUST 3,475. EVENING OF HOPE EVENT EXPENSES 39,524. DIRECTOR'S CONSIGNMENT SHOP SALARY EXPENSE 32,671.
EVENING OF HOPE EVENT EXPENSES 39,524. DIRECTOR'S CONSIGNMENT SHOP SALARY EXPENSE 32,671.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE FORM 990 IS REVIEWED BY THE BOARD TREASURER WITH THE CERTIFIED PUBLIC ACCOUNTANT.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: CONFLICT OF INTEREST DISCLOSURE REQUIREMENTS ARE REVIEWED BY THE BOARD PRESIDENT ANNUALLY AT THE FIRST BOARD MEETING FOLLOWING THE ANNUAL MEETING.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: SALARY FOR THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR IS RECOMMENDED BY THE ADMINISTRATION COMMITTEE AND APPROVED BY THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTE. THE EXECUTIVE COMMITEE USES A SALARY SURVEY PUBLISHED BY THE NATIONAL CANCER SUPPORT COMMUNITY AND COMPENSATION SURVEYS USED BY SIMILAR ORGANIZATIONS IN THE TRI-STATE AREA.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: AUDITED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE AVAILABLE BY REQUEST OR AT THE ORGANIZATION WEBSITE. THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY IS AVAILABLE ONLY BY REQUEST.
CHANGE IN VALUE OF CHARITABLE REMAINDER TRUST 3,475.
THE PROCESS HAS NOT CHANGED SINCE THE PRIOR YEAR.

IdDisregardedEntitiesGrp.PrimaryActivitiesTxt: OPERATES A CONSIGNMENT STORE TO SUPPORT THE CANCER SUPPORT COMMUNITY
